body.name: Seat Cushion for Office Chair, Memory Foam Sciatica Pain Relief Pillow, Seat Cushion for Hip, Tailbone, Coccyx Pain, Desk Chair Cushion for Office, Home Chair, Gaming Chair, Car, Wheelchair
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 mins
features: [Sit With Greatest Comfort] Featuring an exclusive CurveM Pro 2.0 design, Foamula seat cushion possesses all-in-one support, comfort, and relief functions and covers adults from 150 - 220 lbs. Its unique M-shaped cutout naturally conforms to the body's curves, relieving pressure on every bone and allowing the lower back, coccyx, pelvis and legs to unfold for zero soreness and pain.

[Supports Coccyx & Reduces Pressure] Foamula seat cushion is made of high-quality and durable memory foam that has passed OEKO-TEX testing. With ergonomic design, it provides firm and comfortable support while reducing pressure on your lower back and hip as well as improving your posture, letting you sit in comfort and at ease anytime, anywhere.

[Suitable for Most Chairs] Our cushion measures 18.11" x 14.96" x 3.94" and fits most chairs on the market. It can be used in car seats, office chairs, gaming chairs and even wheelchairs to relieve sciatica and back pain, especially great for long drives and journeys. It is the perfect gift for your loved ones.

[Our Customers Love Foamula Cushion] "Although I have a plump bottom, I have suffered from discomfort when I sit down due to my ischial tuberosity bones, aka sit bones, touching hard surfaces. This cushion has cutouts designed for those sit bones. It is very comfortable."

[Take It Now, Decide Later] Foamula creates and designs every product with love and passion for people and the earth. We offer 24-hour after-sales service and are right by your side in case you have any issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought a couple of different brands to see the fit and feel to use as a cushion for my car seat, this one topped it all, very comfy, increased the field of view. The cushion is firm and holds the shape. Above all has a great price Vs competition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As someone who sits all day, this cushion is a game changer. I frequently have lower back and hip problems and this seat helps alleviate most of that pain. It's very comfortable and makes all the difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Work Seat cushion
reviews.reviewText: Use it everyday for my work chair. Gives me the support I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Extremely comfortable!! Using it at work as I write this. I like that it takes tension off my spine and gives me great support. It does add height which is fine for me as my desk is raised a little. Definitely worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I work in a field that is very sedentary, and this cushion has helped with the little bit of back and tailbone pain I was having. It's very comfortable. It is also very supportive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best seat cushion ever!
reviews.reviewText: I'm trying not to get carried away, but this is a back changing, if not life changing cushion!The padding on my desk chair was worn out, and I was getting back pain from sitting on it. This FIXED that! It's a serious cushion, up to four inches thick in some places. It's got a dense foam inside that's still doing it's job a month later. It's got a grippy bottom, so it doesn't slide around on you, although it's easy to pick up and adjust the position. I think the serious cushioning AND the ergonomic shape work together to give you better posture while you're working, and it makes a huge difference if you put in hours seated at a desk! The only caveat is that for someone my size ( I'm tall and my legs don't fit the chair the same ) it can cut off the circulation in my legs, so I get pins and needles after too long - I take that as my cue to get up and walk around. I've never had a cushion make such a big change for the better in sitting comfort. Not only do I love it, but I'm getting some as Xmas gifts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Shocking as in static electricity.As in, you will be shocked at how you're shocking everything.Other than my "Thors Hammer" fingertips my cheeks are no longer sore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very firm, non-heated version. Instant pain relief!!
reviews.reviewText: I got this, because I work from home and after a few hours of sitting my back and legs get very sore. After a long day, I started to get sharp pain in my lower back. After a few months, I was starting to get neuropathy in my feet that was so bad, when I went to bed at night. After only a few days of use, the pain in my lower back and in my seat, started to go away. I also began to notice the the foot pain I had in my feet has almost went away completely! It is very firm, and I like how it molds to my bottom. There are only two things that I really don't like about it, but it's not a deal breaker. For one, it does create some space against the back part of my chair, so I will use a small pillow in the back. The other is that if you are a male, the part of the cushion in the front tends to be rather 'uncomfortable', if you know what I mean. I wish that it didn't have the large 'bulb' part in the front of the cushion. Other than that, compared to the other seat cushions that I have tried, it is AMAZING! The pain relief that it provides is fantastic and the cushion doesn't become flat and useless after a full days use!
